title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2500 - New York Reportable Transactions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2500 - New York Reportable Transactions

State Regulations
§ 2500.1 - Disclosure of New York reportable transactions and related information
§ 2500.2 - Disclosure of participation in a New York reportable transaction
§ 2500.3 - New York reportable transactions
§ 2500.4 - Definitions
§ 2500.5 - Form, timing, and content of disclosure of New York reportable transactions
§ 2500.6 - Determinations and protective disclosures for New York reportable transactions
§ 2500.7 - Retention of documents for New York reportable transactions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2500

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§25, 171, 697, 1096

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
